about_the_game:
Frenetic couch co-op game about fixing train’s railroad.
Get resources, build materials and fix the railroad!
Don't spare any time and cooperate with your teammates to repair the railroad before any train arrives.

Neverfix Station is a game about cooperating with your teammates to repair the railroad before the trains arrive.

Gather resources!
Chop trees and mine iron rocks to gather resources.

Build materials!
Build wooden planks and iron rails from the gathered resources.

Fix the railroad!
Before the trains arrive! Don't spare any time!


That task may not be as easy as it sounds. Every level has unique and interesting mechanics that will challenge players of any level.
Players should multitask, cooperate, act fast and cry out loud to succeed!
